did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Freight Bills of Magma Copper Company 1910-1912
did.abstract: Freight bills, typescript and holograph carbons, pertaining to equipment shipments to the mine during its first years of operation. Most are from the station agent at Florence, Ariz.

repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mining company operating at Superior, Ariz.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Freight bills, typescript and holograph carbons, pertaining to equipment shipments to the mine during its first years of operation. Most are from the station agent at Florence, Ariz.
